mapper.select: select ai.`app_id` `app_id`, ai.`app_name` `app_name`, ai.`dev_id` `dev_id`, dev.`dev_name` `dev_name`, ai.`category_id` `category_id`, c.`category_name` `category_name`, ai.`logo` `logo`, ai.`app_info` `app_info`, ai.`platform_id` `platform_id`, d.`dictionary_name` `platform_name`, ai.`examine` `examine`, ex.`dictionary_name` `examine_name`, ai.`status` `status`, st.`dictionary_name` `status_name`, ai.`checker` `checker`, a.`admin_no` `admin_no`, a.`admin_name` `admin_name`, ai.`create_date` `create_date`, ai.`update_date` `update_date` from `sys_app_info` ai join `sys_dev` dev on ai.dev_id=dev.dev_id join `sys_category` c on ai.category_id=c.category_id join `sys_dictionary` d on ai.platform_id=d.dictionary_id join `sys_dictionary` ex on ai.examine=ex.dictionary_id join `sys_dictionary` st on ai.status=st.dictionary_id join `sys_admin` a on ai.checker=a.admin_id where `dev_id` = #{devId} and 1=1
